name: Scand
tag_list: offshore-software-development, it-services, outsourcing, web-application, programming, database, design, mobile, software-development
overview:
Scand Ltd. is an offshore software development company and an IT outsourcing services provider located in Belarus, Eastern Europe. The company is primarily focusing on custom software application and product development using .NET, Java, PHP, C++ technologies.

Scand is devoted to delivering high quality, world-class and cost-effective outsourcing services.

Offshore and outsourcing IT services offered by Scand Ltd. include

  • custom software development;
  • design, redesign, support, integration and maintenance of custom software;
  • software testing;
  • information technology consulting;
  • writing technical documentation;
  • custom web-design and original artwork.

Core competences:

  • Web application development;
  • Custom Software Development for Windows, Mac OS and Unix;
  • Database design, development and management;
  • Mobile software development.

Key industry focuses:

  • energy carrier production and consumption;
  • architecture and construction;
  • publishing;
  • information safety and secure banking services access;
  • advertising;
  • postal services;
  • production efficiency control;
  • production management (product life cycle management);
  • IT.

Scand Ltd. applies the following methods of work:

  • Fixed bid / price
  • Time and materials (T&M)

  • Offshore Development Centre (ODC) / Offshore Dedicated Team (ODT)

    Software products developed by Scand:

  • Traffic Panel (network traffic management tool);
  • SVG Kit for Adobe Creative Suite (direct support of SVG format for Adobe InDesign and Adobe Photoshop);
  • Phoebius (a truly object-oriented PHP5 framework for complex applications);
  • SkyHistory (addon for Skype that stores and manages the chat history regardless the Skype client settings);
  • SkyRemote (tool for sharing desktop with any other Skype user);
  • Smart Feed Reader (full-featured RSS, ATOM Reader for iPhone and iPod touch);
  • TreeTable (light-weight Java applet for displaying hierarchical grids);
  • JTree (high-performance Java applet for representing hierachically organized data);
  • Vault (Java applet providing multiple file upload and download capabilities);
  • JNDI2R (JNDI service provider to Windows registry).

10+ years in IT, more than 300 successful projects for dozens of customers globally, 100+ highly experienced engineers.

products.name: SVG Kit for Adobe Creative Suite
